00037 /* MACROS */
00038 #define MIN_LOG min_info
00039 
00040 #define MIN_TESTDEFINE( __test_name__ ) \
00041 __test_case_index__++; \
00042 if (__action__ == GET_CASES) { \
00043       ENTRY(*__cases__,#__test_name__,NULL); \
00044 } else if (__action__ == RUN_CASE && __test_case_index__ == __id__ )
00045 
00046 #define MIN_SETUP if (__action__ == RUN_SETUP)
00047 
00048 #define MIN_TEARDOWN if (__action__ == RUN_TEARDOWN)
00049 
00050 
00051 /******************************************************************************
00052  * Assert Macros
00053  *****************************************************************************/
00055 #define __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( __assertion__, __aMessage__ ) \
00056 if(!__assertion__) { \
00057                 min_debug(__FUNCTION__, __LINE__, __FILE__, __aMessage__);\
00058                 RESULT(__result__,TP_FAILED,__aMessage__);\
00059 }
00060 
00061 #define MIN_ASSERT_EQUALS( aExpected, aActual ) \
00062         __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( ( (aExpected) == (aActual) ) , \
00063                               "AssertEquals failed" );
00064 
00066 #define MIN_ASSERT_NOT_EQUALS( aExpected, aActual ) \
00067         __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( ( (aExpected) != (aActual) ) , \
00068  "AssertNotEquals failed" );
00069 
00071 #define MIN_ASSERT_NULL( aPtr) \
00072         __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( ( ( aPtr ) == NULL), "AssertNull Failed" );
00073 
00075 #define MIN_ASSERT_NOT_NULL( aPtr ) \
00076         __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( ( ( aPtr ) != NULL), "AssertNotNull Failed" );
00077 
00079 #define MIN_ASSERT_SAME( aExpectedPtr, aActualPtr ) \
00080         __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( ( (aExpectedPtr) == (aActualPtr) ),\
00081   "AssertSame Failed" );
00082 
00084 #define MIN_ASSERT_NOT_SAME( aExpectedPtr, aActualPtr) \
00085       __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( ( (aExpectedPtr) != (aActualPtr) ),\
00086   "AssertNotSame Failed" );
00087 
00089 #define MIN_ASSERT_TRUE( aCondition ) \
00090         __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( ( aCondition ), "AssertTrue Failed"  );
00091 
00093 #define MIN_ASSERT_FALSE( aCondition ) \
00094         __MIN_ASSERT_SHARED( !(aCondition), "AssertFalse Failed" );
00095
